description: Single storey rear extension, and front porch extension; Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as gym (following demolition of existing outbuilding), Rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope; and replacement of roof tiles. External wall insulations & plaster to front and rear of the main house, change existing front and rear windows with Black UPVC double glazed windows, New 1m height solid brick wall at front garden to boundary with no 111, New block paving to front driveway (Replace existing slab paving).
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

PL/113KAP/PL01 (Ground Floor Plans Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL02 (Proposed Floor Plans First Floor + Loft Floor); PL/113KAP/PL03 (Roof Plans Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL04 (Existing Elevations Front + Rear); PL/113KAP/PL05 (Proposed Elevations Front  + Rear); PL/113KAP/PL06 (Right Side Elevations Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL07 (Left Side Elevations Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL08 (Section A-A Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL09 (Site Plan Existing + Proposed); PL/113KAP/PL10 (Layouts - Outbuilding); PL/113KAP/PL11 (Existing Elevations - Outbuilding); PL/113KAP/PL12 (Proposed Elevations - Outbuilding); PL/113KAP/PL13 (Block Plan & Location Plan as Existing); PL/113KAP/PL14 (Block Plan & Location Plan as Proposed)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
